backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining access control, approval, blob storage mixins, and data models for inventory, challans, payments, petty cash, and clients with admin/approval checks.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking a frontend authentication update to specific files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of various frontend files describing routing, pages, forms, and behavior changes.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_CHECKLIST.md: Deployment and verification guide detailing build steps, critical tests, diagnostics, and troubleshooting instructions.
frontend/index.css: Empty stylesheet placeholder for global frontend styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry file setting up the root element and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Defines the router, initializes diagnostics, wraps routes in backend and auth gates, and sets up all application pages.
frontend/src/components/challans/Challan: Bulk challan upload dialog handling CSV parsing, validation, permission checks, and batch creation results.
Dialog for editing an existing challan, loading initial values, validating inventory quantities, and submitting updates.
Dialog for creating a new challan with form state, item list management, inventory validation, and submission.
Bulk challan uploader that parses a new-format CSV, validates entries, and submits them with permission checks.
Bulk restore dialog for resetting challan dates using a CSV file, including parsing, validation, and permission gating.
frontend/src/components/clients/ClientBu: Bulk client upload dialog that parses a CSV, validates client names, and submits creation results with error reporting.
frontend/src/components/common/AppErrorB: React error boundary that catches render failures and shows a diagnostic UI with expandable details and a copy-to-clipboard report.
frontend/src/components/common/ApprovalR: Full‑page screen for logged‑in but unapproved users to request access, view status, or sign out.
frontend/src/components/common/AuthAppro: Global gate that blocks routes until the user is authenticated and approved or admin, with auto‑bootstrap on admin domains.
frontend/src/components/common/BackendCo: Connectivity gate that probes backend availability and shows progressive loading, errors, and retry options before rendering children.
frontend/src/components/common/BuildInfo: Build and runtime diagnostics panel showing connection status, backend metadata, logs, and retry tools.
frontend/src/components/common/BulkUploa: Provides reusable UI components for bulk upload workflows including steps, helper text, validation, template download, and preview sections showing valid items and errors.
frontend/src/components/common/Diagnosti: Dialog that displays diagnostics logs in a textarea with options to copy the report or clear the log.
frontend/src/components/common/ModalSele: A wrapper for SelectContent that improves scrolling, collision handling, and interaction inside modal dialogs.
frontend/src/components/common/QueryErro: Reusable error display component with retry/sign-in actions and expandable technical error details.
frontend/src/components/common/SignInReq: Dialog prompting the user to sign in via Internet Identity before performing restricted actions.
frontend/src/components/common/SignInScr: Full-page sign-in screen guiding users through Internet Identity authentication with loading and error states.
frontend/src/components/inventory/Invent: Dialog for uploading inventory CSV files, parsing and validating rows, and submitting bulk creation requests with error reporting.
Form dialog for creating or editing inventory items with validation, mutation gating, and sign‑in prompts on authorization issues.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Defines the main application layout with header, sidebar navigation, footer, and conditional modes, hiding layout for print routes.
frontend/src/components/payments/Payment: Implements a dialog for CSV-based bulk payment upload with validation, permission checks, and result reporting.
Provides a dialog form to manually add a payment, handling client selection, input validation, and submission.
frontend/src/components/petty-cash/Petty: Manages petty cash file attachments, supporting uploads, validation, previews, and removal via API hooks.
Implements a CSV bulk upload dialog for petty cash records with validation, permission enforcement, and import results.
Dialog component for creating or editing petty cash records, managing form state, categories, saving, and PDF generation.
frontend/src/hooks/useAccessManagement.t: Hooks for admin access management, including checking admin status, listing approvals, setting approvals, and deriving pending/approved lists.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor tied to Internet Identity, reinitializing on identity changes and invalidating dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorWithConnectio: Enhances actor initialization with connectivity probing, timeouts, retry logic, and detailed connection state tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useAppMode.ts: Determines whether the app is running in admin or staff mode based on hostname patterns.
frontend/src/hooks/useApprovalStatus.ts: Hooks for checking approval/admin status and requesting approval, with periodic refetching for status updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useBootstrapAdmin.ts: Mutation hook to bootstrap the first admin user and refresh related approval queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, handling login, logout, and identity loading via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useMutationGate.ts: Gates mutations based on actor readiness, connection state, and authentication, returning reasons when actions are blocked.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for inventory, challans, and related CRUD operations using an actor backend.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueryDataVersion.t: Provides a hook that exposes a serializable version string based on React Query cache update timestamps.
Determines whether a user can perform bulk upload or delete actions based on app mode and admin status.
frontend/src/hooks/useTodayKey.ts: Returns a date-based key that updates at midnight to trigger recalculations in dependent queries.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets global Tailwind styles, theme variables, and overrides Radix Dialog components for consistent opaque rendering.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with QueryClient and Internet Identity providers, then renders the root component.
Admin-only page for viewing, approving, and rejecting user access requests with loading and permission handling.
frontend/src/pages/ChallanDetailPage.tsx: Displays details for a specific challan with options to edit, print, or delete based on staff restrictions.
frontend/src/pages/ChallanPrintPage.tsx: Renders a print-ready challan view and auto-triggers printing once data is loaded.
frontend/src/pages/ChallansPage.tsx: Displays and manages challans with actions for creation, uploads, restoring dates, and marking returned, respecting authentication and staff restrictions.
frontend/src/pages/ClientBalancesPage.ts: Shows a table of client balances including rent, payments, outstanding amounts, and advances with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Renders daily, monthly, and all‑time business metrics using inventory and dashboard data with formatted statistics.
frontend/src/pages/InventoryPage.tsx: Lists inventory items and supports adding, editing, and bulk uploading items with permission checks and dialogs.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentsPage.tsx: Displays payment records with mode badges and supports adding and bulk uploading payments, handling errors and loading states.
frontend/src/pages/PettyCashPage.tsx: Shows petty cash records with totals and PDF generation, allowing adding and bulk uploading entries under staff restrictions.
frontend/src/pages/ReportsPage.tsx: React page for generating filtered financial reports, handling date ranges, clients, sites, and exporting to Excel.
frontend/src/utils/challanExportTemplate: Builds challan worksheet rows for Excel export with item-level detail and formatted totals.
frontend/src/utils/challanImport.ts: Parses legacy challan CSV files, validating rows and converting them into Challan objects while collecting errors.
frontend/src/utils/challanImportNewForma: Parses new-format challan CSV files, supporting multiple item syntaxes and generating validated Challan objects.
Parses restore CSVs for challan date correction, supporting both legacy and new date formats.
frontend/src/utils/challanTotals.ts: Utilities for calculating challan totals, item totals, and form totals consistently.
frontend/src/utils/clientImport.ts: Parses and validates client CSV uploads, checking for duplicates and generating new Client objects.
frontend/src/utils/csv.ts: Parses CSV text with proper quoting, BOM stripping, line normalization, and multiline field handling.
frontend/src/utils/dashboardMetrics.ts: Calculates dashboard revenue and payment metrics for given periods and computes future challan stats.
frontend/src/utils/dates.ts: Provides date↔nanosecond conversions, normalization, parsing, comparisons, and common date helpers.
frontend/src/utils/diagnosticsReport.ts: Generates structured diagnostics data and formats or copies a text report from runtime logs.
frontend/src/utils/errors.ts: Normalizes and classifies errors into categories like authorization, validation, and network.
frontend/src/utils/exportToCSV.ts: Creates and downloads various CSV templates (inventory, challan, payment, petty cash, clients).
frontend/src/utils/exportToExcel.ts: Builds an Excel workbook with summary, challans, payments, petty cash, and client balance sheets using SheetJS.
frontend/src/utils/paymentImport.ts: Parses CSV into payment rows and validates IDs, dates, and numeric fields to produce Payment objects or errors.
frontend/src/utils/pettyCashImport.ts: Parses and validates petty cash CSV rows, checking headers, dates, duplicates, and numeric values before constructing PettyCash records.
frontend/src/utils/pettyCashPdf.ts: Generates a petty cash PDF using pdf-lib, rendering record details in a formatted table layout.
frontend/src/utils/reportExportFormatter: Provides shared helpers for formatting dates, currency, and text for Excel-style report exports.
frontend/src/utils/runtimeDiagnostics.ts: Captures runtime errors and actor lifecycle events with context, storing a capped diagnostics log in sessionStorage.
frontend/src/utils/safeSerialize.ts: Offers BigInt‑safe serialization and error formatting utilities to avoid JSON stringify failures.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Handles reading, persisting, and removing URL parameters with sessionStorage fallback for routing contexts.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, custom colors, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animation.
project_state.json: Project state file detailing admin-role feature requests, existing issues, and architectural notes for permission/approval logic.
